Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ فِي الْعَوَاقِبِ يُنْجِي مِنَ الْمَعَاطِبِ
enWisdom: Thinking about the consequences saves one from places of destruction

Wisdom: الْفِكْرُ فِي الْعَوَاقِبِ يُؤْمِنُ مَكْرُوهَ النَّوَائِبِ [مِنَ الْمَعَاطِبِ‏]
enWisdom: Thinking about the consequences [of one’s action] saves one from unpleasant calamities

Wisdom: إِذَا قَدَّمْتَ الْفِكْرَ فِي جَمِيعِ أَفْعَالِكَ حَسُنَتْ عَوَاقِبُكَ فِي كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
enWisdom: When you precede all your actions with thought [and deliberation], your outcomes will be good in all matters
By considering the consequences, one is saved from harm
The fruit of reflection is wellbeing
One who reflects, perceives the outcomes
